exceptions.exn: In environment S : Set A : S -> Prop Mult : S -> S -> S O : S Add : S -> S -> S I : S Opp : S -> S d : S H2 : nat H3 : A d H0 : A O H6 : forall q : S, A q -> A O -> O = O \\/ (q = O -> False) /\\ (exists q0 : S, A q0 /\\ O = Mult q q0) -> A q -> A O -> O = O \\/ (q = O -> False) /\\ (exists q0 : S, A q0 /\\ O = Mult q q0) -> d = O \\/ (q = O -> False) /\\ (exists q0 : S, A q0 /\\ d = Mult q q0) H7 : forall q : S, A q -> A O -> O = O \\/ (q = O -> False) /\\ (exists q0 : S, A q0 /\\ O = Mult q q0) -> A q /\\ A O /\\ (O = O \\/ (q = O -> False) /\\ (exists q0 : S, A q0 /\\ O = Mult q q0)) -> A d H4 : forall q : S, A q -> A O -> O = O \\/ (q = O -> False) /\\ (exists q0 : S, A q0 /\\ O = Mult q q0) -> A q -> A O -> O = O \\/ (q = O -> False) /\\ (exists q0 : S, A q0 /\\ O = Mult q q0) -> A q H : forall x y : S, Add x y = Add y x H8 : forall x y : S, A x -> A y -> A (Add x y) H9 : forall x y z : S, Add x (Add y z) = Add (Add x y) z H10 : forall x : S, A x -> Add O x = x H12 : forall x : S, A x -> Add x O = x H13 : forall x : S, A x -> is_opposite S A Add O x (Opp x) H14 : forall x y : S, A x -> A y -> A (Mult x y) H11 : forall x y z : S, Mult x (Mult y z) = Mult (Mult x y) z H15 : forall x y z : S, Mult x (Add y z) = Add (Mult x y) (Mult x z) H17 : forall x y z : S, Mult (Add x y) z = Add (Mult x z) (Mult y z) H1 : forall a b : S, is_gcd a b O -> b = O H16 : forall a b : S, is_gcd a b O -> a = O Unable to unify "O" with "d".

original: intros. unfold is_ring, is_gcd, divide, is_group, is_opposite, commutativity, intern, associativity, distributivity, neutral, opposite in *. intros [H1 H2 H3 H4 H5]. intros d [Hd1 [Hd2 Hd3]]. destruct H1 as [H6 [H7 [H8 H9]]]. destruct H2 as [H10 [H11 H12]]. destruct H3 as [H13 H14]. destruct H4 as [H15 [H16 H17]]. destruct H5 as [H18 [H19 H20]]. assert (Hd1': A O) by (apply Hd1). assert (Hd2': A O) by (apply Hd2). apply gcd_null in Hd3. destruct Hd3 as [Hd3a Hd3b]. rewrite Hd3a. reflexivity.
